ai-mil7.2.1:1.1_0: “Venerable Sir, you say ‘folked one’s army, what is the definite’?”
ai-mil7.2.1:1.2_0: “As in the queen named Gilābha, the fragrant ponds, and the hunger’s shovel and the fluxes, and he is no longer bed.
ai-mil7.2.1:1.3_0: In the same way, great king, one who practices like a caravan with a sharp drunk grass, wood, and water survive on a heap of grass, and leaves wherever he’s lying on the ground.
ai-mil7.2.1:1.4_0: this is the donkey, great king, that is the definition of the Ganges.
ai-mil7.2.1:1.5_0: ‘The Buddha has spoken of the gods of the Thirty-Three: ‘The disciples of Āpaṇa are at me.’
ai-mil7.2.1:1.6_0: The senior monk who has heard this statement should be followed by the Teacher, the teaching, and the Saṅgha.
ai-mil7.2.1:2.1_0: ‘Now while I was sitting in my presence,
ai-mil7.2.1:2.2_0: the rain doesn’t fall on the knees;
ai-mil7.2.1:2.3_0: this is enough for a resolute mendicant
ai-mil7.2.1:3.1_0: the first enquiry, the first enquiry,
